name: Super Slav Brothers
description:
The ultimate competitive gaming experience awaits in this fast-paced, one-on-one Slavic battle ground. Heaps of fun guaranteed; no question.

controls for player 1 are wasd space and arrow keys for attacks. S is a dodge while W is a special move. arrow keys are normal attacks. space is jump

controls for player 2 are ijkl and numpad 12530. 0 is jump

KNOWN BUGS:

Stage selecting doesnt work if you move from one stage to another. Go from the blank space in the middle directly to the stage you want to pick, and hit up tilt.

Being in not fullscreen makes it suck since you move the page up and down
